nodes.text: Yokel Group was the name given to the members of Wraith Squadron who posed as Agamarian brothers for their inspection upon entrance to Storinal.

The group consisted of Garik Loran, Wedge Antilles, and Myn Donos, playing the parts of Dod, Fod, and Lod Nobrin respectively. The members of Yokel Group joined Joyride Group for their theft of two TIE/LN starfighters and subsequent extraction.
